text: Hüsnü Özkara (born 25 January 1955) is a retired Turkish football defender and later manager. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Turkish footballers Category:Trabzonspor footballers Category:MKE Ankaragücü footballers Category:Kahramanmaraşspor footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Turkey under-21 international footballers Category:Turkey international footballers Category:Turkish football managers Category:Boluspor managers Category:Hatayspor managers Category:Kayseri Erciyesspor managers Category:Sarıyer S.K. managers Category:Konyaspor managers Category:Kayserispor managers Category:İstanbul Başakşehir F.K. managers Category:Sakaryaspor managers Category:Adanaspor managers Category:Kardemir Karabükspor managers Category:Giresunspor managers Category:Elazığspor managers Category:Orduspor managers Category:Fethiyespor managers
title: Hüsnü Özkara
